meanings.definition: The introductory page of a website.
meanings.sent1: I always make sure to include a welcoming message on my homepages.
meanings.sent2: When you open a website, the first thing you see is usually the homepages.
meanings.sent3: The homepages of the internet are like the front doors to different houses.
meanings.sent4: Her homepages were like a colorful brochure enticing visitors to explore further.
meanings.sent5: The homepages of online stores often showcase the latest products and deals.

meanings.definition: The main or starting page of a website.
meanings.sent1: The homepages of popular websites are designed to be user-friendly.
meanings.sent2: To navigate a website effectively, you need to understand its homepages.
meanings.sent3: Imagine if the homepages of all websites suddenly disappeared - chaos would ensue!
meanings.sent4: The homepages of successful websites act as virtual storefronts, attracting visitors.
meanings.sent5: Her favorite part of browsing the internet was discovering new and creative homepages.
